name: Snake vs Bunnies
description:
Snake game with smooth locomotion.

Eat bunnies, avoid carrots.

Bunnies proliferate and try to escape.

Once you eat all bunnies on a level, you go to next one, and all levels are procedurally generated, making game gradually more challenging.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys.

Please send me feedback, in comments or on social networks (see my profile).

You can also note that I can't draw, so I'm looking for an artist to collaborate.
